description: Configuration file for ESLint tailored for a Next.js project, utilizing the @eslint/eslintrc and FlatCompat for extending base configurations.

methods.name: __filename
methods.description: Defines the current filename using URL conversion

methods.name: compat
methods.description: Creates a new instance of FlatCompat to handle configuration extensions

methods.name: eslintConfig
methods.description: Array of ESLint configuration extensions for Next.js core web vitals and TypeScript
